Description: The length of the statement  "	var mail = new MailMessage (new string (LocalIPAddress ().Reverse ().Take (3).Reverse ().ToArray ()) + " <sanwa@sanwa.com>"' "kase.tomohiko@sanwaprinting.co.jp"// "1st' 2nd" send both. " is 184.
